TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Now you should choose between the 95.2LTS and 98.1RC petrols.

I wish they called the petrol properly, petroleum.

Granted. They all call out "petroleum" but none ever comes running.

I wish more people than just Kerbiloid and I (though I am very glad Kerbiloid does) would contribute to to the games threads more often. ( it gets boring just seeing my picture on so many of them.)
+1 to the previous poster wish because we need a population diversity in this thread.

But only one person joins.

I wish for a ferrari.

Granted. Here is the key. Be careful when parking it, as the owner would be unhappy if it gets scratched.

I wish for a triangular triangulation of the triangles..

Granted, you get the mighty tetrahedron!

I wish the Lego Vestas wind turbine set wasn't so expensive.

Granted. It is on special for 1 dollar off. (nice to see you.)

I wish that Lego made a Helical Twist VAWT one.

Edited October 16, 2021 by ColdJ

7 minutes ago, ColdJ said:

I wish that Lego made a Helical Twist VAWT one.

Granted. It exists, but it can only be purchased in cuba

I want both DLCs

Granted, but they are one version out of date and you can’t update them.

I wish for the Mike and Ike’s I see in the pantry.

Granted, but you spill them on your way back to the couch

I wish to be able to read KSP logs, so i can find out what mod is screwing my save

Granted, you can read the text on the trees on Kerbin.

I wish I could get my Eve lander to Eve.

Granted. You cave in and cheat it there using the Alt F12 cheats menu, but then feel really guilty about it.

I wish @Souptime uses a text reader to read the KSP.log file and then very paitiently reads right through it.

Granted, i have no idea what all this means.

I wish i could fly!

Granted. You succeeded and now you want a text editor to list a hundred of mods conflicting in your KSP.

I wish, the cooler fans were self-cleaning.

(don't we all)

Granted. Now the seriously cool fans take showers.

I wish I had easy to clean Hepa filters for the intakes of my PC.

granted but your PC exploded that destroy the entire continent


I wish for F-15E to be added in DCS

Granted. Form F-15E, which is a subsection of document F-14D is now added to the Document Collection Service.

I wish that I believed in wishes.

Granted. You believe in a person conveniently named "Wishes"!

I wish to have a computer that can play KSP.

Granted, but now you never get a go, because it hogs the game.

I wish for horses for beggars to ride.

Granted.

Spoiler

 

I wish Ar-Rakis aka Dune was actually Marrakesh.

Granted

I wish to know how to get realism overhaul to load on an 8gig ram

You can't. That's the real realism overhaul from the real world.

I wish KSP didn't require 16 G RAM

Oh no, now you have done it. Granted. Now it requires 160 G of Ram and takes 10 hours to load up.

I wish I could have a CPU and GPU capable of running the really beautiful graphics but still use W 8.1. (The money required to afford them would be nice too)

Granted. You have become a neoluddite and now you can enjoy the real-color, natural-resolution video around.

I wish for laythecoins.

43 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:

I wish for laythecoins.

Granted. Laythe is now a coin.
